name: Skeleton Rampage (Naav)
description:
SKELETON RAMPAGE

Hello! This is Holly and she is about to conquer the world of skeletons. Help her survive the chaos!

This is the first game I was able to do and I hope that you will get the time to play and enjoy the company of Holly! I made this game as an entry to GameJam Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. 

Thanks to the creators of these assets, I owe you all a lot.

Assets: 

  • Main Character (Holly): https://grafxkid.itch.io/sprite-pack-7?fbclid=IwAR1aRzEUIZUKmjPH9WlazPT8q9lCAE0N... by GrafxKid
  • Background (Haunted House): https://franzwarm.itch.io/haunted-mansion-map?fbclid=IwAR1aRzEUIZUKmjPH9WlazPT8q... by Franz Warm
  • Text Font: https://www.behance.net/gallery/16531089/Free-Font-Sabo?fbclid=IwAR3Zu7GmHmiNFhN... by Philippe Moesch
  • Music: {Iron is Laughter} by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org)
  • Enemy Skeletons: https://jesse-m.itch.io/skeleton-pack by Jesse Munguia
